Alguns pontos de vista seu está correto, mas aposto que vc ama ver um lance 
de futebol-arte não é?! Sabe esse bostinha, lixo, mediocre que vc está 
falando ae?! Será pra ele que vc gritará na copa do mundo para fazer um gol 
pela Seleção Brasileira, é esse ridiculo, fingido e comprado que a grande 
chance de dar o hexa a nós brasileiros. Então não critique ele, pois vc não 
sabe o que ele passou, oq ele sofreu, e oq ele viveu para ele está aonde 
chegou! Julgar sem conhecer é a mesma coisa que ter inveja sem assumir! ;)

captions.text: Thank you for all the messages, for the prayers, for everything!
Thank God it was nothing serious,
I will have to rest for a little while...
When I put my feet on the ground, and I couldn't go back,
I don't like staying on the bench, you know?

Not to play... so an injury... Better get back 
on your feet and go!

But the moment I realised I could not stand, 
that I had no balance,

no strengh in my leg, that's when I said to 
myself "It is really serious."
But all good, it's all gonna be good.
You have to go and pay them, you have to pay first!
60, 70 bucks... to fill up the tank.
I'm the kind of person who plays with pain you know?
I've never played without feeling some kind of pain,

the calf hurts, the ankle hurts, it's always hurting 
because that's how football works;
you get hit a lot, even trainning!
They watch the first half in the field
A lot of players go throught this right?

A difficult moment, a challenge. "We have to 
see if he is actually that good!".

And this kind of challenge - I'm experiencing 
it here in Barcelona.
